attributes.action: Govt to grant immigration concession to 10yrs overstayers from  the Commonwealth
attributes.background:
Some Commonwealth nationals are in the UK as 10 yrs overstayers
Commonwealth nationals have strong ties with UK
Our forefathers fought for Britain in I & II world war
Our citizens are being recruited for UK military
Most overstayers have transferrable skills that are beneficial to UK economy

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by an "immigration concession".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what change you would like the Government or Parliament to make.
